content: I believe that Mors will take good care of\nthe creatures you donate.
info: 幻雪关于捐赠生物的闲聊_幻雪流程闲聊1

content:
I heard you're collecting specimens?
Do remember to bring spare tools with you,
especially when heading out. *giggles*
info: 幻雪关于捐赠生物的闲聊_幻雪流程闲聊1

content:
I hope that when I'm asleep,
Butterflies will still come to visit me with their gentle wings.
info: 幻雪关于捐赠生物的闲聊_幻雪流程闲聊1

content:
Yee~ Are you looking for creatures?
The crabs and shrimp on the beach, the little fish jumping in the lake,
They're all so lively~!
info: 幻雪关于捐赠生物的闲聊_幻雪流程闲聊1

content:
Back at the Academia,
she would often get so absorbed in caring for those little creatures
that she'd skip lunch and dinner... right up until breakfast.
info: 幻雪关于捐赠生物的闲聊_幻雪流程闲聊1

content:
Have you heard of the "Three Great Nightmares" of the Academia?
The number one nightmare is—
When you prepare everything meticulously before heading out, only to have your equipment break after using it once!
info: 幻雪关于捐赠生物的闲聊_幻雪流程闲聊1
